text:
After configure I have some Errors by creating a makefile. The messages is:
exports.c redefinition of "ap_hack_apr_xml_insert", and many more of this 
message
[exports.lo]Error1
[all-recursive]Error1

I want to update Apache_1.3.22 --> Apache_2.0.35, the compiler is gcc
creator: monika.seehoefer@lua.nrw.de
slive@apache.org
text:
Could you be more specific about exactly what version of gcc you are using
and give a little more of the context for the error message.  It seems likely
that this is a problem on your system, since we haven't heard of many
problems compiling on linux.

No response from submitter, assuming it was a problem specific to her machine.  If you're 
still seeing this problem, feel free to reopen this report. 
Thanks for using Apache!
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
